name: The Crayon Dining Table
description: The Crayon Dining Table forms part of the vibrant Wanderlust Collection and is a sleek example of contemporary British furniture design. This stylish piece is ideal for those who want to inject a burst of colour and is available in a wide range of different shades to create different moods in high gloss and satin. These tables also look incredibly smart in any of Davidson's signature timber finishes. The table comes in two standard sizes specifically designed for use as a breakfast table or a small Crayon dining table. Bespoke sizes are also available upon request. Always with a keen eye for detail, the round table top has a high polished flat frieze with a smooth indentation that gives character and charisma, all standing on a bold crayon shaped base.
